entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Snow level lowering to 1200 metres this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023
